It's Premier Sports Cup week as the quarter-final stage arrives.
At Ibrox, Rangers host Dundee for a place in the last four in what's certain to be an intriguing tie. Gio van Bronckhorst's side got … [+1943 chars]

articles.title: T20 World Cup: Scotland shock West Indies in Group B - BBC
articles.description: Scotland, ranked 15th in the world, start their T20 World Cup campaign in brilliant fashion with a shock victory over West Indies.
articles.content:
ICC Men's T20 World Cup, Blundstone Arena, Hobart
Scotland 160-5 (20 overs): Munsey 66* (53), MacLeod 23 (14); Holder 2-14, Joseph 2-28
